ygData.subject: Re: [The EverQuest Tavern] Shammie Barb needs help
ygData.msgSnippet: just for argument sake though there is also the lake of ill omen in kunark (long boat ride and dangerous run to get there) (i didn t like it because there was
ygData.messageBody:
just for argument sake though
there is also the lake of ill omen in kunark (long boat ride and dangerous run to get there)
(i didn't like it because there was so much resistance to some of my favorite druid spells and the nearest safe zone is kos to goodies being the iskar newbie area)
and there is paludal caverns (sp?) on luclin (never went but have heard good things)
i still would prefer highkeep though
i have a 17 de sk alt ill be taking there soon
hehe clopped goblin coming up
to get to highkeep, get a druid to take you to north karana
run south east from the druid rings to the river, go left at river to the bridge, cross bridge to east karana
follow road from there and you will see a stone marker that will point the way to highpass hold
it turns into a light road that takes you up a mountian pass (dont fall off)
when you zone in to highpass hold watch out for gnolls and dead end paths, veer to the right
then left and you should see the keep entrance
or just ask someone
(invis and sow of course)
ok..so maybe druids are excessively helpful sometimes
lol


nomiea winter wolf
44 woodelf druid
xev server, guilded by ancient fellowship
----- Original Message -----
From: jlteal
To: theeverquesttavern@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Thursday, July 18, 2002 6:22 PM
Subject: [The EverQuest Tavern] Shammie Barb needs help


I am back from a four month hiatus because of a move. Since I am back
with the game and I have yet to find my EQ books and that notes that
are sitll pack away somewhere, I am looking for a place to send my
lvl 22 Shammie Barb for a good hunt. My character right now is in E.
Commonlands. Any advice or suggestions would be helpful as I get back
into the game. Thanks for your help.
Lynny Grenouilleneige
